评论概述: Be careful if you have broad shoulders
评论详情: There is no give to the shirt. The fabric is nice though. I bought both large and medium. Different patterns/colors. The medium fit almost perfect (34DD, 31 waist) I have slightly broad shoulders. I'm returning the medium because there is no give in the fabric and the shoulders were just a tad tighter than I wanted. I could certainly wear it to an event and be fine but getting it off was quite a dance and I could see needing help after a few cocktails. Also, once I saw the pattern in person I just didn't like it as much. I'm keeping the large for now. I'm iffy on the pattern, again it takes me back to the 90's and I've been there. Done that.
